Name: ensure_team_has_scrum_master
Description: Each team must have a Scrum Master

Name: require_user_story_acceptance_criteria
Description: All user stories must have acceptance criteria

Name: enforce_task_status_not_blocked
Description: Tasks cannot be blocked by unresolved blockers

Name: limit_worker_per_team
Description: Each worker belongs to only one team

Name: require_sprint_goal_defined
Description: Sprint must have a defined goal

Name: require_feature_status
Description: Features must have a valid status

Name: ensure_velocity_based_on_recent_sprints
Description: Velocity must use at least 3 sprints

Name: require_product_owner_email
Description: Product Owner must have valid email

Name: enforce_sprint_duration_limit
Description: Sprint duration must not exceed 30 days

Name: require_stakeholder_relevance
Description: Stakeholder must be relevant to at least one feature

Name: ensure_documentation_linked
Description: All features must have linked documentation

Name: require_task_type_defined
Description: All tasks must have a defined type
